thread.title: BRIEF-Synlogic Doses First Patient In Phase 1b/2a Trial Of SYNB1020 For Treatment Of Hyperammonemia In Patients With Cirrhosis

title: BRIEF-Synlogic Doses First Patient In Phase 1b/2a Trial Of SYNB1020 For Treatment Of Hyperammonemia In Patients With Cirrhosis

organizations.name: treatment of hyperammonemia in patients with cirrhosis reuters

text:
Market News April 2, 2018 / 11:09 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Synlogic Doses First Patient In Phase 1b/2a Trial Of SYNB1020 For Treatment Of Hyperammonemia In Patients With Cirrhosis Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Synlogic Inc: 
* SYNLOGIC DOSES FIRST PATIENT IN PHASE 1B/2A TRIAL OF SYNB1020 FOR TREATMENT OF HYPERAMMONEMIA IN PATIENTS WITH CIRRHOSIS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
